Additionally, check the total amount spent on Cricket products purchased through Internet channels since DATE('now','-1 year') to confirm eligibility for a loyalty discount.

actions.sql: SELECT cust_id FROM customers WHERE cust_email = 'Whitehead@company.example.com';
UPDATE supplementary_demographics SET occupation = 'Retired', household_size = '2' WHERE cust_id = (SELECT cust_id FROM customers WHERE cust_email = 'Whitehead@company.example.com');

SELECT SUM(s.amount_sold) FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.prod_id = p.prod_id JOIN channels c ON s.channel_id = c.channel_id WHERE s.cust_id = (SELECT cust_id FROM customers WHERE cust_email = 'Whitehead@company.example.com') AND p.prod_category = 'Cricket' AND c.channel_desc = 'Internet' AND s.time_id >= DATE('now','-1 year');
